r.d: This program reformat and beautify PHP 4 and PHP 5 source code files automatically. The program is Open Source and distributed under the terms of PHP Licence. It is written in PHP 5 and has a command line tool.
r.n: - Bug fix [#4151]: Lot of NOTICES when use IndentStyles filter(silly me!) - Bug fix [#4501]: Fixed online docs and command line arguments mismatch - Bug fix [#4572]: Verify cli before access to STDOUT on Batch.php - Bug fix [#4573]: Removed default indent, to maintain coding standars of PEAR.
